text:
Uncaught exceptions thrown from servlets are not redirected to the error-page 
defined in the web.xml deployment descriptor; the default Exception Report is 
shown instead. Exceptions thrown from JSP's are correctly redirected to the 
defined error-page. If the same web-app is deployed under Tomcat-3.2.1, the 
error-page works correctly for both servlets and JSP's.
